welcome_message_body: Welcome to Araguari, Brazil! Get ready to be charmed by the city's rich history, vibrant culture, and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Araguari has to offer.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport. Network name and password are displayed on screens throughout the terminals.
